content.description: If you want a bit more of a challenge than Reloaded, this is a fun extension that adds a fair amount of difficulty and complexity (which may change as it gets chalked and ticked).  After pulling the bulge, instead of heading right to the chains, go up and left towards a new set of chains.
content.location: Leftmost route on the north side of the Narrows.  Shares a start with Reloaded

content.description: A slabby and easy route on the far right side of the north wall.
content.location: Far right side of the north wall.

content.description: A powerful and bouldery line between Texture and Narrow Beginnings.  Hard, bouldery climbing through the first four bolts.  After that, tricky face climbing to a final crux that will spit you if you're pumped.
content.location: Between Texture and Narrow Beginnings, on the north side.  Starts in a scoop on the right side of the wall, and heads through a sequence of right-trending pockets.

content.description: Bouldery moves to a rest, followed by a final push over a bulge to the chains.  Shares chains with TKO
content.location: On the north side of the crag, to the right of Dust and the left of TKO

content.description: A link from Boiler into Black Sails
content.location: Start on Boiler “Teflon” traverse all the way to the big protruding block on Black Sails and shoot up from there.

content.description:
A fun but relentless jaunt up a right leaning dihedral.  There isn't any obvious crux on this route; just continuously hard moves without any good rest, from bottom to top.  Great rock, and a great fitness test 12a to cut your teeth on.

This was incorrectly called "Bitch" for a while.
content.protection: bolts to anchors.  It appears the first bolt was removed or somehow pulled out, so a stick clip is definitely nice to have on this route.
content.location: On the left side of the north wall, just to the left of Black Sails.

content.description: Climb TKO into the top of Naropathic.

This linkup shares the bottom crux of TKO and the crux of Dust, and traverses across Textures And Narrowpathic. After doing the bottom of TKO, it becomes less steep. The "pod rest" to Textures, with big underclings, will be to the left of you. You traverse above that pod, not down-climbing into it, and gain the jug rest that is right below the crux of Narrowpathic. From here you traverse up and left, which should put you with your hands in the bottom of Dust's top pod, and your feet stemming across the top of the lower pod. The next moves put you right into the start of Dust's crux.
content.location: Starts in smooth face on right side of cliff, before Refiner.

content.description: This route climbs half of “Boiler” and does a traverse across Black Sails and finishes on Dusts' chains. Lots of great moves and Grips.
content.location: Start on Teflon Guerilla and finish on Dust.

content.description: A bouldery start leads to a good rest, followed by a short roof and slab finish to the chains.  If you go over the right part of the roof (from some good underclings to a pocket above), much harder than 5.11; probably a one-move wonder 5.12 at that point.
content.location: On the far left side of the north wall.

content.description: Fairly sequential with big moves on good holds at the bottom to a tricky crux with multiple solutions finishing with a couple bolts of easy slab.  No single move will shut you down, but it is easy to be out of sequence and "stuck" at several points.
content.location: Right side of the northern Narrows, a bit to the left of the 10 warmup.  If you go too far left (just around the arete) you'll hit TKO.

content.description: A great and more direct variation on Texture.  The new addition features positive holds as it pulls directly through the overhanging upper section.
content.protection: bolts.  Has its own anchors above the lip.
content.location: Start on Texture, but head up and left after clipping the 3rd bolt.

content.description: Good fun route.   Easy approach just off the road, has a mini pumpy crux and a great finish after that.
content.location: You cant miss this one as you can hit it with your car.  Its right off the route and as you drive up the canon it is the second bolted climb from the right.

content.description: This route pulls multiple cruxy bulges.
content.location: Between ATV and Bitch, on the left side of the north wall.

content.description: Start on Narrowpathic and join up with Dust at the second pod, then fire the Crux. Fun linkup, has better and more fun moves than each route individually in my opinion.

Start on

Dirt

.  Continue past anchors through a roof to a second set of anchors.
content.location:
Branches from

Dirt

, which is in the center of the north wall and just to the right of

Black Sails

.

content.description:
An 11d ending on a set of chains before an overhanging roof.  Used to be the "warm up" for the area.  Continuing to the upper anchors is Dust, 13a.  See

utahclimbers.com/phpBB3/vie…

(specifically, Mike Call's comments) for a bit of history and background.
content.protection: Bolts to a two chain anchor.
content.location: This route is in the middle of the north wall, just to the right of Black Sails.

content.description: Starts on The Boiler (Teflon) and moves to the right after 5th bolt. Moves up into into black streak left of Black Sails and does not go into Black Sails. The pump is steady build, without the greatest rest at any point.

Climb Black Sails up to the big blocky undercling and move right into the roof left of dust, finishes on its own own chains to the left of dust. Awesome movement, one of the best boulder problems on the wall!
content.protection: Fixed draws to chains. S/O to Adam Griffith for providing draws and bolting the route!

content.description:
This is a relatively new route to the area; a tree at the base of this route was removed when they widened the road.

A fun start on great rock, followed by a brief slab and a good no-hands near some underclings.  From there, head into a bouldery roof section with fun moves and some hard pulling!  Pull up and over the lip to clip the chains.
content.location: Located immediately to the left of Dust/Dirt, and to the right of Bitch.

content.description: This route pulls a series of bulges via crimps and tiny crimps to the ½ way mark. After a brief rest, continue to top on easier, but still technical terrain. One bolt (3 or 4) is tricky to hang/might be dangerous if one fell clipping.
content.location: Immediately to the right of Reloaded, on the left side of the north wall
